name: When Cats Yawn
description:
When Cats Yawn - A cat game for Alberta Game Jam 2021  

by Vivian Liang and Zhining (Andi) He  

08/13/2021 - 08/15/2021  

Game Jam Theme

Chain Effect

Game Description

We all know that yawns are contagious, even for cats: 

If one cat yawns, all the cats around it would yawn as well.

Left-click to drop your yawning cat and experience the chain effect of cat yawns! 

Challenge yourself by reaching the goals -- How many levels can you pass? 

It is time to test your luck... And have fun! 

Features

- Easy to play - Just a single click and the cat will do everything for you :3

- Infinite levels - Completely randomly generated levels every time you play! 

- Compete with your friends - The game will auto record your highest score on the title screen -- Who is the true yawning cat god? 

Engine used

Godot 3.3.2 

WARNING: The game is SO addictive! We literally spent 24 hours making it and 24 hours playing it. We advise you that do not play it until finishing your own project. Thank meow for your corporation :3
